news.title: Trump expected to sign executive order to reclassify marijuana as soon as Monday, source tells CNBC; pot stocks surge
news.description: Trump expected to sign executive order to reclassify marijuana as soon as Monday.

news.title: Oracle says there have been 'no delays' in OpenAI arrangement after stock slide
news.description: Oracle pushed back against a report that said the company will complete data centers for OpenAI, one of its major customers, in 2028, rather than 2027.

news.title: Red-hot Texas is getting so many data center requests that experts see a bubble
news.description: Cheap land and and cheap energy are helping to fuel a boom in proposals to build data centers in Texas.
